listings.Description of job/activites: Join us in pioneering breakthroughs in healthcare. For everyone. Everywhere. Sustainably. Your role includes taking initiative to learn the processes, supporting the OTC team in processing customer orders, coordinating with partners for timely delivery, generating reports, managing documentation requirements, and ensuring compliance with export and import rules.
listings.Requirements/qualifications: Undergraduate students or fresh graduates are welcome. Knowledge of ERP Systems, strong IT skills, a broad understanding of supply chain management, and strong communication skills are required.
